Question.Subject: is there any good places to get an ice-cream sundae from in Invercargill New Zealand?
Question.Content: so i live in Invercargill New Zealand and i want to know if there are any good places to buy an ice-cream sundae from other than mc donalds lol

Answers.Answer: you live in NZ and you eat McDonalds ice cream? you're mad! Any of the tip-top places have great ice-cream, get them to mix it up.

any Ice Cream In NZ no matter where as New Zealand has the best bl**dy ice cream in the world I was in NZ for a few weeks had some Ice Cream and really enjoyed it I will go back just to eat some Ice Cream
